verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> let us <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G3379>lest,<s%> while a <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G2641>remains<s%> of <S%G1525>entering<s%> His <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of you should <S%G1380>seem<s%> to have <S%G5302>come<s%> <S%G5302>short<s%> of it.

For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> we have had <S%G2097>good<s%> <S%G2097>news<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> to us, <S%G2509>just<s%> as they <S%G2548>also;<s%> but the <S%G3056>word<s%> they <S%G189>heard<s%> did not <S%G5623>profit<s%> them, because it was not <S%G4786>united<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G191>heard.<s%>

For we <S%G5101>who<s%> have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> that <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He has <S%G3004>said,<s%> "As I <S%G3660>swore<s%> in My <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> They shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> My <S%G2663>rest,<s%>" <S%G2543>although<s%> His <S%G2041>works<s%> were <S%G1096>finished<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For He has <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4225>somewhere<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G2250>[day<s%>], "And <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2664>rested<s%> on the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> day from <S%G3956>all<s%> His <S%G2041>works<s%>";

<S%G1893>Since<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it <S%G620>remains<s%> for <S%G5100>some<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> it, and <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G4387>formerly<s%> had <S%G2097>good<s%> <S%G2097>news<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> to them <S%G3756>failed<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience,<s%>

He <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G3724>fixes<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G4594>"Today,<s%>" <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>long<s%> a <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as has been <S%G4275>said<s%> <S%G4275>before,<s%> <S%G4594>"Today<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> His <S%G5456>voice,<s%> Do not <S%G4645>harden<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>"
For <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2424>Joshua<s%> had <S%G2664>given<s%> them <S%G2664>rest,<s%> He would not have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that.

For the one <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1525>entered<s%> His <S%G2663>rest<s%> has <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2664>rested<s%> from his <S%G2041>works,<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> did from His.

Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> that <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> [following] the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5262>example<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience.<s%>

For the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2198>living<s%> and <S%G1756>active<s%> and <S%G5114>sharper<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> two-edged <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and <S%G1338>piercing<s%> as <S%G891>far<s%> as the <S%G3311>division<s%> of <S%G5590>soul<s%> and <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> of <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G719>joints<s%> and <S%G3452>marrow,<s%> and <S%G2924>able<s%> to <S%G2924>judge<s%> the <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> and <S%G1771>intentions<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

And there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%> <S%G852>hidden<s%> from His <S%G1799>sight,<s%> but <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1131>open<s%> and <S%G5136>laid<s%> <S%G5136>bare<s%> to the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of Him with <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G3056>have<s%> to <S%G3056>do.<s%>

Since <S%G3767>then<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> let us <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G2902>fast<s%> our <S%G3671>confession.<s%>

For we do not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4834>sympathize<s%> with our <S%G769>weaknesses,<s%> but One <S%G5101>who<s%> has been <S%G3985>tempted<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> as [we are, yet] <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G4334>near<s%> with <S%G3954>confidence<s%> to the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G5485>grace,<s%> that we may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> and may <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to <S%G996>help<s%> in <S%G2121>time<s%> of <S%G2121>need.<s%>
